Title: Midnight Diner
Writer: YarÃ´ Abe (manga), Katsuhiko Manabe (screenplay), Kensaku Kojima (screenplay), Joji Matsuoka (screenplay)
Actors: Kaoru Kobayashi, Saki Takaoka, Tokio Emoto, Mikako Tabe
Plot: A cook opens a restaurant that only serves from midnight till dawn. One day, he discovers an obituary urn. Follow the stories of his regulars tangled astound this urn.
